apps.name: Springfield
apps.developerName: Project Springfield - Powered & Coded by BodNJenie (EA Originally)
apps.subtitle: Standard Version üç©
apps.localizedDescription: The #1 Fan-remade server for The Simpsons: Tapped Out. 100% free with access to live active events, unlimited donuts, instant builds, and more.
apps.versionDescription: Fan-remade server - 100% free! Unlimited donuts, quick builds, ongoing events, and much more!

apps.name: Unicorn Mod
apps.subtitle: Modding Version ü¶Ñ
apps.localizedDescription: Do not play before lvl 60. Cheat engine/god mode. Quests are disabled (so play from other versions). Access to everything, modded menu to find things faster, a search for unique items, even level-locked things & more! Has a button to farm donuts or can go through the store. Skilled users should only use this mod as it's powerful.
apps.versionDescription: Unicorn is God mode. Do not use unless level 60+. This is a powerful mod!

apps.name: Taps
apps.developerName: Project Springfield - Powered & Coded by BodNJenie (Originally EA)
apps.subtitle: End Game Version üëá
apps.localizedDescription: Last version before EA shut it down. Access to all previously released event items. Still need to progress through the questline like normal. No access to events (because you have all their rewards in the shop already). Cletus' farm can harvest donuts. Golden Goose Realty gives 5 tiles / 12h instead of 1. Can buy shattered dream tokens. Has more store categories.
apps.versionDescription: End version of the game. Store has every item & Cletus farm has farmable donuts.

news.title: Project Springfield üëã
news.caption: Keep The Simpsons: Tapped Out alive! All versions are 100% free with unlimited donuts and instant builds. Join our Discord for support!

news.title: All 3 Versions Now Available!
news.caption: Choose your playstyle: Standard for everyone, Unicorn for God mode (level 60+), or Taps for the complete end-game experience!
